title: The Juggling movie
creator_credit: Patrick Melly and Little Red Filmhouse
brief_description: Shows three jugglers instructing children in the skills of juggling and then performing a comic juggling routine in front of an audience. Features the Pickle Family Jugglers (Larry Pisoni, Peggy Snider, Cecil McKinnon). Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
